subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The loss was the fifth defeat in the last six games for the Mets and the 10th in the last 13 for an injury-weakened and disillusioned team that is reeling toward the All-Star break.
snippet: The loss was the fifth defeat in the last six games for the Mets and the 10th in the last 13 for an injury-weakened and disillusioned team that is reeling toward the All-Star break.
